coreAttributes.name: leather pants
coreAttributes.description: A pair of skin tight leather pants which show of the shape of the wearer's lower abdomen.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the leather pants, before pulling them up and fastening the button at [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the leather pants, before pulling them up and fastening the button at [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the leather pants, before yanking them up and fastening the button at [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc.her] leather pants, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc2.namePos] leather pants, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc2.namePos] leather pants, before yanking them off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the top of [npc.her] leather pants back up to sit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the top of [npc2.namePos] leather pants back up to sit around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the top of [npc2.namePos] leather pants back up to sit around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the top of [npc.her] leather pants.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the top of [npc2.namePos] leather pants.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the top of [npc2.namePos] leather pants.
